title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: Mobile Blended Learning for Building a Design-Maker Learning Community

context.prior_knowledge: Basic competency in digital tools and foundational knowledge in science subjects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peer makers using mobile devices and open-source platforms to design and build one science experiment kit
Learners can improve design prototypes three or more times by incorporating peer feedback in online community spaces
Learners can perform project-based learning in a makerspace and submit the results as a portfolio
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
